pages.text: $(li)The Grindstone is a block that can be used to repairs items and tools.
$(li)If this block is placed near a Villager without a job, it will be turned into a $(l:patchouli:villagers/weaponsmith)Weaponsmith$(/l).
$(li)To use it, you have to right click on it and place two similar Tools into the Grindstone Slots.
$(li)You can place Enchanted Books or an enchanted Tools to disenchant them and obtain Experience in the process.
